A l'issue de ses ventes, son bénéfice lui permettra de continuer son activité mais aussi de s'occuper de sa famille.
texts.en: The group Talwendpanga is composed of two very determined women. Marcelline is the group’s official; she is a married mother of three children, of whom one is in school. This good and honest lady has a business selling ice water and drinks made from ginger or bissap [dried hibiscus flowers].  She has been in this business for six years. In Burkina, the weather is currently hot, so this loan will be very useful to Marcelline, where she may provide to her customers. From her sales, the profits will enable her to continue her business but also to take care of her family.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, bissap, and ginger to make juice drinks to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase 'pagne' cloth

loans.name: Ma. Fe

texts.en:
Ma. Fe is 40 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school.

Ma. Fe works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

Ma. Fe requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell. She has borrowed and repaid 6 loans from NWTF before this loan.

Ma. Fe aspires to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Norma works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Norma is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase more groceries like biscuits, soap, sugar, soft-drinks and beverages to resell for her general store business.

Norma has been sustaining her business activities through her past 25 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries like biscuits, soap, sugar, soft-drinks and beverage to resell.

loans.name: Rolinda

texts.en:
Rolinda is 49 years old and married with five children. Two of her children are in school. She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines and is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and to pay her laborers.

Rolinda has been farming sugarcane for eight years and also earns income from pig fattening. She is working tirelessly toward attaining her dream: to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to pay her laborers.

loans.name: Eliza

texts.en:
Eliza is a 46 year old, married woman with one child who is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Eliza has a restaurant business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 15 years. Eliza requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy additional utensils and ingredients for her restaurant business.

In the future, Eliza would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional utensils and ingredients for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Nadège

texts.fr: Nadège est une femme mariée et âgée de 29 ans. Nadège vit à Adidogomé avec ses trois enfants et exerce son activité pour subvenir aux besoins quotidiens de la famille. Nadège vend des produits cosmétiques dans le quartier. Nadège s’approvisionne au marché deux fois par mois. Nadège demande ce prêt pour acheter des tissages et des mèches afin de satisfaire favorablement ses clients et avoir une bonne rentabilité pour d’aider ses enfants à s’épanouir.
texts.en: Nadège is a married woman, 29 years old, who lives in Adidogomé with her three children. She runs a business to meet the day-to-day needs of the family. Nadège sells cosmetic products in her district. She gets her supplies at the market twice a month. She is asking for this loan to purchase weaves and hair extensions in order to satisfy her customers and to make a good profit. She can then help her children to thrive.

loans.use: to purchase 33 weaves and 46 hair extensions

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es: El señor José Luis nació en un lugar llamado pueblo nuevo en el departamento de Jinotega . Recuerda que no fue a clases por que le ayudaba a sus padres y hermanos a trabajar en  sembrar granos básicos. Actualmente esta casado y tiene 5 hijos. Don José Luis trabaja en agricultura, siembra granos básicos y café el cual cosecha con sus hijos. Con mucho esfuerzo ha podido ir sembrando café y ha podido comprar algunas herramientas para trabajar. En la comunidad donde el vive no hay luz eléctrica es por eso que solicita un préstamo para la compra de un sistema solar y así poder tener luz en su casa de habitación y este sistema será de gran beneficio para todos los miembros del hogar, dice que con esfuerzo uno puede tener sus cosas, estaría muy agradecido si le brindan la oportunidad de este préstamo para la compra de este sistema solar.
texts.en:
Jose Luis was born in a place called Pueblo Nuevo [New Town] in the Department of Jinotega. He remembers that classes were not available because children helped their parents by working, sowing basic grains.

Today, Jose Luis is married and has five children. With great effort, he works in agriculture, planting basic grains and coffee, and harvests the coffee with his children. With hard work, Jose Luis has been able to plant coffee and has even purchased some tools to help in the work.

there are no electric lights in the community where he lives. That is why Jose Luis is requesting a loan to purchase a solar system. then he can have lights in his residence. An electrical system will be of great benefit to all the members of the household. Jose Luis believes that with effort, one can have such things. 

He would be very grateful if we could offer him the opportunity, through this loan, to buy a solar system.

loans.use: to obtain electricity by purchasing a solar system.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is a 52-year-old married woman with three children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Delia has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more items such as soft drinks, canned goods, school supplies, and other groceries.

Delia has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items such as soft drinks, canned goods, school supplies, and other groceries.

loans.name: Thoma

texts.en:
This is Thoma, who dressed up for the photograph because he said he wanted to look his very best. (Dressing up to take a picture is very common in rural areas like this.) As seen here, he is standing in the midst of his apple and plum orchards. He is requesting a 300,000 ALL loan through VisionFund Albania to be used to dig a well to water the trees.

“Working in our orchards is what we have been doing for about ten years now—well, it’s all me because my wife is paralyzed and can’t do much, anyway. Our earnings depend more or less on many factors: the wholesale buyers and their prices, the quality of the fruit and the list goes on,” said Thoma to the loan officer while they were walking to the orchard.

loans.use: to dig a well to water his apple and plum orchards

loans.name: Alban

texts.en:
Alban wants to plant potatoes because the season has started already. In order to do this, he is seeking financial help to buy potatoes seedlings and prepare the soil for planting.

“I’m 33 and single and that makes it easier for me at the moment to focus on work; plant and harvest and sell, that’s it. I've been doing this for almost 10 years now and this has been the earnings for me and my mom who I live with and I plan the same when I get married as well. You know that in our region, specifically in the villages, you can’t leave the parents all on their own, because they need your help and you need theirs. That’s how it goes,” said Alban.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings and prepare the soil for planting

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 44 years old and married with four children, who all attend school.

Josephine works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more items like sardines, detergent soap, noodles and other groceries.

Josephine has borrowed and repaid 32 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 14 years and also earns an income from charcoal retailing.

Josephine aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items like sardines, detergent soap, noodles and other groceries.

loans.name: Wendkonta 02 Group

texts.fr: Rihanata, âgée de 35 ans est membre représentatif de ce groupe de 6 membres. Elle est mari, mère de 4 enfants dont 2 sont scolarisés et les 2 derniers sont encore en bas âge. Rihanata a besoin de ce crédit pour acheter des pièces détachées de moto et de vélo pour revendre afin de ce faire un bénéfice. Rihanata fait ce commerce afin de s'épanouir et d'aider son époux à assurer l'avenir de leurs enfants.  Elle aimerait à l'avenir devenir grossiste des pièces détachées et avoir un employé pour l"aider dans son commerce moyennant une rémunération mensuelle. A la fin du prêt, Rihanata épargnera une partie de son bénéfice et le reste pourrait servir dans la gestion de sa famille.
texts.en:
Rihanata, aged 35, is the representative member of this group of six. She is a married mother of four children, of whom two are in school, and the last two are still young. Rihanata has need of this loan to purchase spare parts for motorbikes and for bicycles to resell, so as to make a profit. She has this business to come into her own and to help out her husband in ensuring their children’s future. 

In the days to come, she would like to become a wholesaler of spare parts and to hire an employee to help with her business by means of a monthly pay. At the end of the loan, Rihanata will save part of the profits, and the rest could be used for managing the family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for motorbikes and bicycles to sell

loans.name: Barakandi Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe de 4 femmes est à son 10ème contrat de prêt avec ACFIME et jusque là, tout se passe bien. Le groupe est toujours à jour de ses remboursements. Mariam est la responsable , elle est mariée et mère de 3 enfants tous scolarisés. Cette brave dame fait du jus, qu'elle conserve au frigo pour vendre.Elle a besoin de ce prêt pour acheter du sucre, du tamarin, du bissap, et gimgimbre, etc pour faire du jus vendre. A l'issue de ses ventes, le bénéfice lui permettra de soigner ses enfants en cas de maladie et de subvenir à ses propres besoins.
texts.en: This is the 10th loan agreement with Acfime for this group of four women and until now all is going well. The group is always up-to-date with their repayments. Mariam is the leader, she is married with three children all of whom attend school. This good lady makes juice that she keeps in the fridge for resale. She needs this loan to buy sugar, tamarind, hibiscus flowers, ginger, etc., to make juice to sell. When she has made her sales, the profits will enable her to take care of her children in case of illness and cover her personal needs.

loans.use: to buy sugar, ginger, hibiscus flower and the other ingredients (mint, vanilla sugar...) to make juice for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in an iron gate and workers needed to install the gate in her home.

loans.name: Gloria Emperatriz

texts.es: Gloria de 29 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus 2 hijos de 13 y 7 años de edad que son la mayor alegría del hogar. Ella se gana la vida prestando sus servicios de seguridad desde hace 3 años, lo que le ha permitido sostener la economía de su hogar, con el apoyo de su compañero de vida. Gloria desea construir la cocina de su vivienda en el espacio que se observa en la fotografía, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, madera y tejas para construir la cocina de su vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Gloria is 29 years old and lives in her own house with her partner and their 2 children, who are 13 and 7 years old and are the happiness in the home. She has made a living by offering security services for 3 years, which has allowed her to support the household finances, along with the support of her partner.

Gloria wants to build a kitchen in her home in the space shown in the photograph. For this, she requests a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, gravel, wood, and tiles to build the kitchen in her home as soon as possible.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, wood, and tiles to build a kitchen in her home.

loans.name: Cfjdt 21 Group

texts.fr: CFJDT 21 est un sous groupe affilié à la Convergence des Femmes et de Jeunes pour le Développement de Tassette. Il est composé de femmes  qui habitent dans le même village et font pratiquement les mêmes activités. La présidente MAREME est une femme mariée et mère de famille qui aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. Elle évolue dans la commercialisation de bétail et sollicite ce montant pour aller dans les marchés hebdomadaires acheter des bœufs, moutons et chèvres pour les élever et ensuit les revend dans le marché locale. Elle a une expérience de plus de 10 ans et commence sa journée à 6h pour la terminer à 19h. A l'avenir elle voudrait importer des bœufs venant d'Europe pour métisser son cheptel et produire beaucoup de lait. Ainsi elle pourra augmenter ses revenus et epargner de l'argent. De ce fait elle pourra diversifier son activité et élargir le nombre de ses employés.
texts.en: Cfjdt 21 is a group that is affiliated to the Convergence of Women and Young people for the Development of Tassette. It is made up of women who live in the same village and do more or less the same activities. The president named Mareme is a married woman with children, who helps her husband to manage the daily expenses and school fees of her children. She works in livestock sales and requests this loan to go to the weekly markets to buy cows, sheep and goats to raise them and then sell them at the local market. She has over ten years experience and starts work at 0600 to work until 1900. In the future she would like to import cows that come from Europe in order to crossbreed her herd and produce a lot of milk. Thus, she could increase her income and save money. In this way, she could diversify her business and increase the number of her employees.

loans.use: to buy cows, sheep and goats to raise them and then sell them.

loans.name: Flordeliz

texts.en:
Flordeliz is 48 years old and married with two children.

Flordeliz works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of items like feed, rice, snack food, canned goods and school supplies to sell.

Flordeliz has borrowed and repaid 3 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for twenty years and also earns an income from a restaurant.

Flordeliz aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of items like feed, rice, snack food, canned goods and school supplies to sell.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Gemma works hard to support her family.

She has a clothing sales business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from auto-shop and variety store businesses. Gemma is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy more items like blouses, pants, school uniforms and other ready-to-wear clothing.

Gemma has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items like blouses, pants, school uniforms and other ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.name: Christy

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Christy works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Christy is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food business.

Christy has been sustaining her business activities through her past 25 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, which is to save enough money and continue to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Gerlie

texts.en:
Gerlie is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 42 years old, and both of her children are in school.

Gerlie has a snack food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her halu-halo business.

Gerlie has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her halu-halo business.

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en:
Jenelyn is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Jenelyn is 39 years old, and both of her children are in school.

Jenelyn has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more items like canned good, spices, soft drinks, noodles and other groceries.

Jenelyn has been in this business for 18 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more items like canned good, spices, soft drinks, noodles and other groceries.

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en:
Juanita is 62 years old and a married woman with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Juanita has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 9,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more stock of rice to sell.

Juanita has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of rice

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
Jessica is 50 years old and married with six children. Two of her children are in school; she is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Jessica has a nipa roofing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy raw materials for her nipa roofing business.

Jessica has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her nipa roofing business.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.en:
Mercedes is single and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Mercedes requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for 12 years.

In the future, Mercedes would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase a lot of clothing to resell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Margareth Del Cristo

texts.es:
Margareth, de 26 años, tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere para su vida y está decidida a culminar sus estudios para salir adelante y tener una buena vida.

Ella desea desempeñarse como vendedora de calzado independiente en el municipio de Chinu, en el cual trabaja en un almacén y allí ha podido obtener buena experiencia.

Esta actividad desea iniciarla con el afán de buscar los recursos necesarios para su sostenimiento y para sus estudios, además de poder contribuir con los gastos en su hogar.
Es una mujer emprendedora y muy disciplinada.

Ella solicita un crédito para comprar un amplio surtido de zapatos, sandalias, tenis, entre otros al por mayor y de este modo aprovechar la oportunidad que le presenta la Corporación Interactuar de ser independiente.

Tiene la esperanza de poder progresar como empresaria y tener unos ingresos más estables y agradece a todas las personas que puedan contribuir con su sueño.
texts.en:
Margareth, aged 26, knows exactly what she wants out of life, and she is determined to finish her studies to get ahead and have a good life.

She wants to work as an independent shoe saleswoman in the municipality of Chinu, where she works at a store. In this place, she has been able to gain good experience.

She wants to follow this occupation in order to generate the necessary income to support herself and her studies, and to help out with the household expenses.

She is a very enterprising and disciplined woman.

She is requesting a loan to buy a wide range of shoes, sandals, and sneakers, among other products, wholesale. In this way, she will make the most of the opportunity to be self-sufficient that the Interactuar Corporation is offering her.

She hopes to be able to thrive as an entrepreneur and have a more steady income, and she is grateful to all the people who are able to help her make her dream come true.

loans.use: to buy a wide range of shoes, sandals, and sneakers, among other products.

loans.name: Najwa

texts.en:
Najwa has a small business; she is doing hand-beaded products and selling them. 

Najwa asked for a loan to improve her project and to buy more products to sell.

She lives in Wihdat and is the mother of two children. Her business is located in her home, and her primary customers are regulars. Najwa is doing the products by herself, and she is working hard to help her husband in household expenses. 

She has dreams she wants to achieve, and this loan will help her to achieve her dreams. Najwa is waiting for your support.

loans.use: to improve her project and to buy more products to sell.

loans.name: Kastriot

texts.en:
This is Kastriot with his wife, Drita, or “Light” in English. They have two young children; their three-year-old son unfortunately suffers from a chronic illness. They are very poor and barely make ends meet.

“We want to buy a dairy cow, to have milk and other dairy products for our two young children,” they said to the loan officer and branch assistant. “We can’t afford dairy, so we thought that buying a cow would be very productive in the end despite the hard labor we’ll have to put into it.

“We remain very hopeful that lenders will be compassionate about our financial situation and lend us some money. In return, we promise that we will pay them back because maybe we are poor, but not irresponsible at all,” they said almost simultaneously, both of them sighing throughout the interview.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow so they can feed their two young children (one of whom suffers from a chronic illness).

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen is 42 years old and has three children. Carmen is married and her two children are still in school.

Carmen is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. Carmen requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Carmen has been in this business for 12 years and has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en:
Cynthia is 58 years old and single. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Cynthia has a charcoal retailing business in the Philippines. Cynthia requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy additional stocks of charcoal to resell.

Cynthia has been in this business for ten years. In the future, Cynthia would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of charcoal to resell.

loans.name: Alba Ines

texts.es:
Alba es una mujer pujante, servicial y trabajadora, a sus 46 años de edad, es casada y madre de 2 hijos al que ha sacado adelante con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación.

Desde hace 4 años se desempeña en el campo de la confección, prestando el servicio de confección a terceros y a clientes directos, el oficio lo aprendió a través de clases y trabaja sola todos los días, así genera los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.

Actualmente se motiva a solicitar el crédito para comprar una maquina nueva y así remplazar la que tiene en mal estado, esto le permitirá trabajar mejor para cumplir con la entrega oportuna de los pedidos que tiene pendientes, logrando fidelizar a sus clientes actuales.

Alba manifiesta que desea continuar realizando su labor con mucho empeño, pues quiere ampliar su negocio y poder generar oportunidades de empleo, además de garantizar una estabilidad económica para dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alba is a thriving, helpful, and hard-working woman. At 46 years old, she is married and is the mother of 2 children, who she has brought forward with a lot of effort and dedication.

For 4 years, she has worked in the dressmaking field, offering her dressmaking services to third parties and to direct clients. She learned the trade through classes and by working by herself everyday. Thus, she earns enough resources to support her husband with the household finances. 

At present, she is requesting a loan to buy a new machine to replace the one that she currently has that is in bad shape. This will allow her to work better in completing the timely delivery of the order that she has pending. This will then help her to succeed in promoting loyalty among her current clients. 

Alba says that she wants to continue pursuing her work with a lot of determination, so she wants to grow her business and be able to generate job opportunities, in addition to guaranteeing stable finances to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a new machine to replace the one she currently has that is in bad shape.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 61 years old. She is a married woman with six children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Marilou has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. Marilou requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more stock of rice to sell.

Marilou has been in this business for nine years. In the future, Marilou would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of rice to sell.

loans.name: Marietta

texts.en:
Marietta is 55 years old and married with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Marietta has a food-vending business in the Philippines. Marietta requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food business.

Marietta has been in this business for 14 years. In the future, Marietta would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Sabah

texts.en:
Sabah, a married woman, has four children. She is 52 years old and lives in Irbid. Her husband has retired because of his bad health situation. 

Sabah wants to be a productive woman and got a loan in the past to open a shop for sewing and to buy a new sewing machine.

Sabah now has a shop with two machines, and it works well, but she is an ambitious woman and wants to help her husband with tuition for her children. She decided to buy a new sewing machine, but it is so expensive; that's why she requested again another loan for buying a new sewing machine to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 46 years old and has seven children. Imelda is married, and three of her children are in school.

Imelda is in the agricultural business of farming rice in the Philippines. Imelda requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Imelda has been farming rice for 17 years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Imelda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 20-year-old university student. He is a second-year student studying food and nutrition science. He lives in Irbid.

Mohammad is working hard and always spends his free time working in a shoe shop. He would like to request a loan because he does not have enough finances to pay for his university fees. This loan will help him graduate successfully and pay for his upcoming semester.

After graduation, Mohammad hopes to have a proper job and then he will be able to save enough money to help his family.

loans.use: to pay for his university fees

loans.name: Jose Claro

texts.es:
José, de 64 años de edad, estudio hasta primer grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, tiene siete hijos de los cuales, solo cuatro están viviendo con él, los otros tres ya formaron sus propias  familias.

José, se dedica a la agricultura, desde siempre se ha dedicado a esta actividad y aprendió a ejercerla ya que necesitaba una fuente de ingresos para mantener a sus hijos, también siembra hortalizas para el consumo de su familia, el recorrido para llegar hasta su milpa es de 15 minutos, le acompaña su hijo que es quien le ayuda en la cosecha. 

José, necesita el crédito para comprar alambre de púa, pagar el arrendamiento de la tierra y pagar la mano de obra, para cerca el terreno y poder sembrar sus cultivos.

José, sueña con comprar un terreno, para poder cultivar todos los granos básicos, aparte de eso desea tener ganado para poder obtener cuajada, crema y otros productos derivados de la leche, todo para obtener mejores condiciones a su familia.
texts.en:
José, who is 64 years old, attended school until the third grade. He is married and his wife works in the home. They have seven children, 4 of whom live with them; the other three have their own families.  José works in agriculture and has always worked in this field.  He learned the business because he needed a source of income in order to support his children.  He also grows crops for his family's consumption. 

The trip to his field takes 15 minutes.  He is accompanied by his son, who helps him with the harvest.  José needs the loan to purchase barbed wire, pay rent for his land, pay workers, enclose his land, and sow the fields. He dreams of purchasing land in order to grow staple grains.  He also would like to own cows so that he can have cheese curds, cream, and other dairy products, all so that he can provide his family with better conditions.

loans.use: to purchase barbed wire, pay rent for his land, pay workers, enclose his land, and sow the fields.

loans.name: Fatima  Aljamia Group

texts.en:
Fatima Aljamia Group consists of four women from Sana'a city, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB.

The leader of the group is Fatima, who is 45 years old with six children. Having a water heater is very important for any house in Sana'a city because the climate is cool most days. Unfortunately, Fatima doesn't have enough money to purchase one. As a result, she applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy a water heater for her house.

Having a water heater inside the house will help Fatima's children to wash daily, and the hot water will be healthy for them. In the beginning, Fatima was warming up water using the oven for her children to wash. That consumes a large amount of gas, as well as takes a long time.

Fatima believes this loan will provide her family with a better living. With the water heater, warming up water will be very easy and will consume a very small amount of electricity.

Fatima looks forward to providing her family with a better future.

loans.use: to buy a water heater for her house.

loans.name: Abdel Kader

texts.en:
Abdel Qader is a 18-year-old single man from Jenin city. He opened a store for selling cosmetics and gifts in the city. The store is located in a very good area.

Abdel took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more products like makeup and gifts. By taking this loan, Abdel will be able to improve his business and attract more clients.

Abdel appears in the photo in his store

loans.use: to buy more products like makeup and gifts

loans.name: Liberty

texts.en:
Liberty is 45 years old and married with two children. She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines, and has requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Liberty has been raising pigs for six years now, and has borrowed five times in the past, from NWTF and more recently from Kiva, to sustain her business. She is working tirelessly toward attaining her dream: to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF in order to buy more sacks of rice to sell to customers.

Rowena successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. NWTF is re-listing Rowena's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina is 73 years old and single. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

Josefina has been in this business for 24 years and has previously received funds through Kiva. She aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is 52 years old and married with two children. Both of her children are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Evangeline has a general store business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy shampoo, canned goods, diapers and other groceries.

Evangeline has been in this business for 28 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, canned goods, diapers and other groceries.

loans.name: Marigen

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Marigen works hard to support her family.

She has a clothing retail business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening.  Marigen is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy more items like pants, school uniforms, toys and other ready-to-wear clothing to sell.

Marigen has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more items like pants, school uniforms, toys and other ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.name: María Hortencia

texts.es:
María, de 51 años de edad, estudio hasta primer grado, está casada y es madre de 3 hijos, dos de ellos ya están casados, en su casa solo vive ella con su esposo, un hijo y una nieta que estudia tercer grado.

María, trabaja al igual que su esposo desde hace 20 años en una cooperativa del café, en la cual también su esposo es socio, el trabajo está a 10 minutos desde su casa y lo hacen de lunes a viernes, de 6:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar los insumos agrícolas, para sembrar porque se acerca la temporada de sembrar, los cuales sirven para el consumo de su familia.

El sueño de María, es obtener una buena cosecha y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María is 51 years old and attended school until the first grade. She is married and is the mother of three children, two of whom are married. She lives with her husband, her son, and a granddaughter who is in the third grade.

María and her husband have worked at a coffee cooperative for the past 20 years and they are both members. They work 20 minutes from their home. They work from Monday through Friday, 6:00 am until 3:00 pm.  

They need the loan in order to purchase agricultural supplies in order to sow the fields because planting season is coming. María's dream is to have a good harvest so that she can provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies and to sow the fields.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase construction materials to make a necessary renovation for the house.

loans.name: Gilberto De Jesus

texts.es: Don Gilberto,nació en una comunidad llamada San Isidro. El no estudio ya que para esos tiempos no habían escuelas, pero ya grande aprendió a leer y escribir. A la edad de 12 años empezó a trabajar en agricultura con su papa. Actualmente esta casado y tiene 5 hijos, se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos y café. Con mucho esfuerzo compro una despulpadora la cual le sirve en temporada de corte de café y el está en planes de hacer un beneficio húmedo comenta que con esfuerzo, dedicación y perseverancia, se pueden logar muchas cosas. En esta comunidad no hay luz eléctrica y quisiera tener una oportunidad para recibir un crédito y así poder comprar un panel solar el cual será de gran beneficio para todos los miembros del hogar, en temporada de corte de café la señora se podrá levantar por las madrugadas y poder alumbrarse para hacer la comida de los cortadores, además los hijos podrán hacer las tareas por las noches, y podrán cargar su celular y no estar molestando a los vecinos. Estaría muy agradecido si le brindan la oportunidad de este préstamo para la compra de este sistema solar.
texts.en:
Gilberto was born in a community called San Isidro.  He did not attend school because, at that time, there were no schools. He learned to read and write as an adult.  When he was 12 years old, he began to work in agriculture with his father.  He is now married, has 5 children, and makes a living by growing staple grains and coffee.  With great effort, he purchased a coffee pulping machine, which he uses during the period when he harvests the coffee.  He has plans to set up a wet method processing center.  He believes that, with perseverance, dedication, and effort, one can achieve many things.

There is no electricity in his community, so he would like the opportunity to receive a loan to purchase a solar panel, which will greatly benefit all members of his household.  During the harvest season, he'll be able to wake up at dawn and illuminate the home in order to prepare food for the workers, his children will be able to do school work at night, he will be able to charge his cell phone, and he will not have to bother the neighbors.

He is very grateful for the opportunity to receive this loan in order to purchase a solar energy system.

loans.use: to purchase a solar energy system.

loans.name: Rezeq

texts.en:
Rezeq is a 49-year-old married man from Dier Al-Balah city. He is a father of one son. Rezeq works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income, which barely covers all the family needs. He would like to improve the family living conditions and buy all the needed stuff.

Rezeq took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water, which will decrease the usage of electricity for the family.

Rezeq appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water

loans.name: Nadya

texts.en:
Nadya lives in Marka. She is a 47-year-old married woman with three children. One of those children is Mahmoud who is appears in the photo instead of Nadya because she is a conservative woman.
 
Nadya is keen on raising her children and teaching them the best education. Her son Mahmoud is studying accounting. He chose this major because it is easy to find work in this field.
 
The father is retired and his pension is not enough to cover Mahmoud`s university fees. Therefore, Nadya applied for an education loan to help her son to pay his semester fees.

loans.use: to help her son to pay his semester fees

loans.name: Jamal

texts.en:
Jamal is a 54-year-old married man from Deir El balah city. He is a father of one son. Jamal works as an employee in a local firm where he gets a low income. This income is barely enough to cover all the family needs. He would like to improve the family's living conditions and buy all the needed stuff.

Jamal took out a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water. This will decrease the usage of electricity for the family.

Jamal appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water.

loans.name: Awad

texts.en:
Awad is a 31-year-old married man from Dier El balah city. He lives with his wife and four sons in a small simple house. Awad works as an employee in a local firm where he gets a low income. This income is barely enough to cover all the family needs. He would like to improve the family living conditions and buy all the needed stuff.

Awad took out a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water. This will decrease the usage of electricity for the family.

Awad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water.

loans.name: Cfjdt 22 Group

texts.fr: CFJDT 22 est un sous groupe affilié à la Convergence des Femmes et Jeunes pour le Développement de Tassette. Il est composé de 4 hommes et une femme. Cette femme est la présidente de ce sous groupe, elle se nomme ASTOU et se reconnait sur la photo par la main levée et évolue dans la commercialisation des céréales. Elle est brave et sollicite ce montant pour acheter des céréales, les stocker et ensuite les vendre. Elle est mariée et mère de famille. Malgré son jeune age, elle a une expérience de plus de 5 ans dans cette activité. Elle aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. Elle commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 16h. A l'avenir elle voudrait avoir un grand magasin de stockage pour augmenter et diversifier ses marchandises.
texts.en: CFJDT22 is a subgroup affiliated to the Women and Young People’s Association for the Development of Tassette. The subgroup is composed of four men and one woman, who is the subgroup’s leader. Her name is Astou; she is the one raising her right hand in the photo. She sells cereals. She is very resourceful and is seeking this loan to buy cereals, store them and resell them later. Astou is married and has children. In spite of her young age, she already has five years of experience in this domain. She helps her husband take care of everyday expenses as well as their children’s school fees. She starts her work day at 8 Am and finishes at 4 PM. In the future, Astou would like to have  a large warehouse in order to expand and diversify her goods.

loans.use: to buy cereals such as millet, corn, sorghum, and peanuts in order to store them and resell during dry season.

loans.name: Djiguifa Group

texts.fr:
Tiéman  est un Malien éleveur de bœuf âgé de 60 ans, marié avec une ménagère et père de 6 enfants, âgés de 7 à 16 ans sont tous scolarisés. Il a plus de  10 ans d’expérience dans l’élevage de bœuf. 
Il souhaiterait de devenir un grand importateur et exportateur de bœuf dans sa zone local.
Il est souvent confronté au problème d’argent pour financer son activité d’élevage au moment  propice à hauteur de souhait.Tiéman emprunte de l’argent auprès de RMCR pour augmenter le volume  de son activité d’élevage de bœuf.
Il se sent à laisse d’exercer l’élevage car il participe au développement économique de sa localité.
Il s’approvisionne au marché local et revend ses bœufs dans le même marché.  
Le profit qu’il procure lu permet de  subvenir aux besoins de sa faille tel que (la nourriture, frais scolaire, frais de santé etc…).
texts.en:
Tiéman is a 60-year-old Malian cattle farmer who is married to a housewife and the father of six children, ages 7 to 16, all of whom attend school. Tiéman has more than 10 years of experience in raising cattle. He would like to become a major importer and exporter of cattle in his area.

Tiéman often deals with the problem of [having enough] money to finance his farming business as he would wish at the right time. He borrows money from RMCR to increase the volume of his cattle farming business.

Tiéman feels good about running his farming business because [it allows him to] participate in the economic development of his area.

Tiéman gets his supplies from the local market and sells his cattle at the same market. The profit he obtains [will] allow him to meet the needs of his family (such as food, school fees, health expenses, etc.).

loans.use: To purchase cattle to raise and then resell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase various kinds of vegetables to resell to local residents.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to acquire new blankets, beds, as well as cushions to make some of the necessary improvements for the house.

loans.name: Shorouq

texts.en: Shorouq is 20 years old and is studying for a degree in health control. She  lives in Irbid, and she is working really hard to get ahead and to grow. Shorouq dreams of having a good job so that she can help to pay for her daily expense and achieve her dream, which is to be a productive woman and important person. She applied for an educational loan to pay for her university fees.

loans.use: to pay for her university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy construction materials to renovate a part of her house

loans.name: Murad

texts.en:
Murad is a young man who is studying in university majoring in tourism management. His dad died many years ago and he is working in a carpentry workshop in his free time to help his brothers.

Murad is happy and satisfied with the loan that he will receive; it will help him to pay his semester fees. He wishes in the future he might be able to travel abroad to complete an advanced education and work at the same time.

loans.use: to pay his semester fees.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.en:
Svetlana has been selling women's clothes for many years. Due to Kiva loans, she has developed her business quite well. She is a very responsible and hardworking person. Svetlana plans to buy another sales outlet and help her children to buy a house.

Svetlana is asking for a loan of 47,500 UAH to increase her assortment of women's clothes. She wants to buy robes, pajamas, underwear and sports suits.

loans.use: to purchase additional clothing inventory for spring such as robes, pajamas, underwear and sports suits

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.en:
Svetlana is married and has one daughter. Svetlana has her own business.

Svetlana has been selling household goods at the market for nine years. She is an active, hardworking and friendly person. Svetlana makes sure to have a large assortment of goods to please her customers. She chooses the most popular products to offer for sale.

Svetlana is asking for a loan of 31,000 UAH to buy goods for the memorial days. Around Easter Day, people in Ukraine buy artificial flowers, wreaths and baskets. Svetlana wants to have enough goods to sell to increase her income and take better care of her family.

loans.use: to purchase artificial flowers, wreaths and baskets for memorial days

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water.

loans.name: Gloria Leticia

texts.es: Gloria de 58 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su hijo de 35 años de edad que es su única compañía luego de perder a su esposo. Ella se dedica a atender su tienda de productos básicos, gracias a la cual sostiene la economía de su hogar desde hace 10 años. Gloria desea construir una galera y bodega en su vivienda ya que como se observa en la fotografía la galera que tiene actualmente tiene la madera y las láminas deterioradas, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: polines, cemento, arena y lamina para construir una galera y una bodega en su vivienda y de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Gloria is 58 years old and lives in her home with her 35 year old son who is her only company after she lost her husband. She earns a living working in her shop where she sells basic products, thanks to this she has been providing for her household for ten years. She wants to build a shed and a cellar in her home as can be seen in the photograph, the shed that she has currently is made of deteriorated wood and metal sheets. Therefore she is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in beams, cement, sand and corrugated metal sheets to build a shed and a cellar in her home and in this way, improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in beams, cement, sand and corrugated metal sheets to build a shed and a cellar in her home.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 52 years old with six children. Lolita personally sells the catch from their fishing boat in nearby municipalities.  Since she became a member of Paglaum MPC, she has been a member in good standing for almost three years. She wants to obtain financial assistance from Paglaum MPC amounting to PHP 10,000 for the purchase of new nets.  

As much as possible, they have to have all the needed fishing accessories to minimize chances of a low or zero catch.  She already has floaters to help guard their fish cages.  She also wants to buy the fish catch of her neighbors so she can sell more fish to the nearby fish market, where they will fetch higher prices. In the future, she dreams of purchasing a new fishing boat by setting aside some savings from the daily sales.  She wishes to see her children have stable jobs as well.

loans.use: to purchase new nets

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosa de 48 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijos de 18 y 14 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que todos los días sale a ganarse la vida vendiendo huevos de forma ambulante recorriendo las calles de los cantones cercanos desde hace 10 años. Rosa desea terminar de construir un muro que comenzó hace un año para el cual solicito un crédito a FUSAI, por lo que desea adquirir un nuevo crédito a FUSAI que le permita invertir en: bloque de cemento, arena, grava y hierro para terminar de construir el muro de su vivienda.
texts.en: Rosa is 48 years old and lives in her home with her husband and her two children who are 18 and 14 years old. She is a hardworking women who goes out everyday travelling around to earn a living selling eggs. She goes round all of the streets of the nearby areas and has been doing this for ten years. Rosa wants to finish building a wall that she started a year ago and for which she asked for a loan from FUSAI. So she wants to get a new loan from FUSAI that will allow her to buy cement blocks, gravel, sand and iron in order to finish building the wall in her house.

loans.use: to buy cement blocks, sand, gravel and iron to finish building a wall in her home.

loans.name: Merly

texts.en:
Merly is 42-years-old, married, and has three children. Two of her children are still in school.

Merly is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Merly has been in this business for 12 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other supplies

loans.name: Tchilalo

texts.fr: Agée de 28 ans et mère de deux enfants, Tchilalo est une femme mariée qui vit à Vakpossito avec sa famille. Tchilalo vend des charbons de bois dans son quartier et gagne une bonne rentabilité dans son activité. Tchilalo s’approvisionne au marché trois fois par mois. Pour acheter des sacs de charbons, Tchilalo souhaite ce crédit pour réaliser sa commande et tirer une bonne marge bénéficiaire pour venir en aide aux besoins quotidiens de sa famille
texts.en:
Tchilalo is a 28-year-old married woman and the mother of two children who lives in Vakpossito with her family. Tchilalo sells charcoal in her neighborhood and makes a good profit in her business. She gets her supplies at the market three times per month.

Tchilalo would like this loan in order to purchase sacks of charcoal and have a good profit margin so she can help with her family's daily needs.

loans.use: To purchase four sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Hatipo

texts.fr: Agée de 36 ans, Hatipo est une femme mariée qui vit à Adidogomé et a trois enfants à sa charge. Dans son quartier, Hatipo vend des céréales à ses clients et trouve son revenu grâce à ce commerce. Pour répondre efficacement aux besoins, Hatipo s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Hatipo demande ce crédit pour commander des sacs de maïs et des bols de riz afin de réaliser encore plus de revenus pour soutenir  les charges quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
Hatipo is a 36-year-old married woman who lives in Adidogomé and has three children in her care. In her neighborhood, Hatipo sells cereals to her clients and earns her income thanks to this business. In order to respond efficiently to [customer] needs, Hatipo gets her supplies twice a month at the market. 

Hatipo is requesting this loan to order sacks of corn and bowls of rice so she can make an even larger income to support the daily expenses of her family.

loans.use: To purchase three sacks of corn and 44 bowls of rice.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase construction materials to complete and renovate his small house

loans.name: Mustapha

texts.en:
Mustapha is a 47 year old Palestinian professional photographer. He lives with his wife and children in a Palestinian refugee camp located in North Lebanon. He has been married to his wife for more than twenty years and together they have raised their two children inside the camp. His wife is unemployed and his children have both graduated from school, education being a priority despite the financial instability the family is going through due to the surrounding environment. 
After 32 years of experience in the photography business, Mustapha succeeded in preserving a respectable reputation among his clients which encouraged him to have his son help him in the studio. 
He is asking for a 2,569,000 Lebanese pounds loan to buy a new professional camera that will improve his work quality, keep his customers satisfied and hopefully attract new customers with the summer season approaching. A new equipment will make his work easier and allow him to expand by accepting more and more projects inside the camp which will increase his family's income.

loans.use: to buy a professional camera

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, and a flush toilet, and to pay for labor to build a washroom.

loans.name: Estela Del Carmen

texts.es: Estela de 28 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus 2 hijos el mayor de 8 años de edad y el menor de 6 meses de edad. Ella se dedica a ofrecer una gran variedad de ropa de forma ambulante recorriendo los cantones cercanos, en los que ya la esperan para adquirir sus productos que son de excelente calidad. Estela desea terminar de construir su vivienda, ya que le falta colocar unas ventanas y terminar de construir la sala de su vivienda, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: ventanas, cemento, arena y mano de obra necesaria para colocar las ventanas y construir la sala de su vivienda.
texts.en: Estela is 28 years old and lives in her own home with her partner and her two children. The oldest is 8 and the youngest is 6 months. She earns a living travelling around and offering a big variety of clothes. She goes around all of the nearby areas, where they already wait for her in order to buy her excellent quality products. Estela wants to finish building her home as she is missing fitted windows and she wants to finish building the living room in her home. She is therefore asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in windows, cement, sand and the necessary labour in order to fit the windows and to build the living room in her home.

loans.use: to invest in windows, cement, sand and necessary labour to fit the windows and to build the living room in her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase building materials to add a room to her house

loans.name: Marlene

texts.en: Marlene is 53 years old and married. She is known in their area for her direct-selling business. She is actively participating in the various programs and services that the PMPC offers. To gain additional earnings, she hopes to pay for the acquisition of pawned cocoland, for which reason she applied for a loan to PMPC. Marlene hopes to maintain her membership in good standing, with a good repayment record. She is very thankful when all her financing needs are supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to pay for the acquisition of pawned cocoland

loans.name: Concordio

texts.en:
Concordio is 72 years old and lives in Poblacion, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. He is married with 5 children now at their adult age. 
He earns a living from the sales at their sari-sari store. 

At present he is enjoying his monthly pension of not less than Php10,000, and he has been receiving this for more than 10 years already.  

He has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional stocks of groceries and other consumable products to sell. Concordio has been a member of PMPC for 2 years.  

In the future, Concordio hopes to expand his sari-sari store business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries and other consumable products.

loans.name: Vanessa

texts.en:
Vanessa works hard to support her family. She has a retail business of buying and selling rice grains in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice grains to sell.

Vanessa has been in this business for one year now.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice grains to sell

loans.name: Savy's Group

texts.en:
Savy is 30 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the Snoul district of Kratie province. She has two dependent children to take care of. Cassava-growing is the primary source of her family’s income to make a living and she has been in this business for five years. To supplement the income, she also works as a paid worker. With the current business, she can earn approximately 40,000 KHR per day. 

This is the second micro loan for Savy with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now leading her group to apply for a loan, Savy will use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business to earn a larger income to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Astrid

texts.es:
A sus 37 años de edad Astrid logró consolidar un negocio de confección a terceros y línea propia de ropa gracias a la experiencia que tuvo trabajando en talleres, trabaja de lunes a sábado entre 9 y 11 horas diarias dependiendo la cantidad de trabajo y sabe que gracias a sus clientes tiene buen negocio. 

Quiere ampliar sus horizontes y lograr ofrecer trabajo a las personas más necesitadas por lo que solicita un crédito para la compra de una maquina fileteadora con la que podrá expandirse a nuevas empresas y tener mejor volumen de trabajo dándole la oportunidad a una persona de trabajar. 

Su sueño es seguir creciendo y conformar un taller y así un día contar la historia de que gracias a colaboradores y prestadores del portal Kiva y a la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar pudo montar un gran negocio.
texts.en:
At 37 years of age, Astrid managed to consolidate her sewing business making clothes for others and her own clothes line thanks to the experience she had working in workshops. She works from Monday to Saturday, from 9 to 11 depending on the amount of work she has and she knows that thanks to her customers she has a good business.

She wants to broaden her horizons and be able to offer work to people that need it most and so she is asking for a loan to buy an overlock sewing machine which she will be able to spread out to other businesses and have more work in order to give another person the opportunity to work.

Her dream is to continue to grow and form a workshop and therefore one day be able to tell the story that thanks to her collaborators and lenders from Kiva and help from Corporación Interactuar, she was able to build a big business.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine.

loans.name: Miris Edith

texts.es:
Miris, a sus 33 años de edad, es una mujer carismática y servicial que se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, una pequeña tienda de abarrotes que inició por la necesidad de generar ingresos para sacar adelante a su familia en zona rural del municipio de Puerto Escondido. 
A pesar de las adversidades, ella tuvo la fortaleza y la determinación para levantarse y seguir adelante y, gracias a ello lleva 1 año de trayectoria en esta actividad.
Trabaja todos los días durante 8 horas sola
Su propósito en la vida es seguir progresando y por ello desea fortalecer su negocio acreditándolo con la compra de surtido de productos como abarrotes, granos, frituras, bebidas gaseosas y en general productos básicos de la canasta familiar, de esta forma podrá ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor calidad y servicio, logrando aumentar notablemente sus ventas y los ingresos que recibe de sus ventas.

Miris manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo su negocio con la ayuda de Interactuar. 

Apoyando a este crédito estarás contribuyendo con el emprendimiento de las mujeres Colombianas!
texts.en:
Miris, 33, is a charismatic and helpful woman who works in her own business, a small grocery store that she started up due to the need to generate income to support her family.  She lives in a rural part of the municipality of Puerto Escondido.

In spite of adversity, she had the strength and determination to raise herself up and continue forward.  Thanks to her efforts, she's been on this path for a  year.

Miris works every day on her own for 8 hours a day.  Her goal in life is to continue to make progress.  To do this, she wants to fortify her business by stocking up on grocery products such as: grains, fried foods, soft drinks, and other consumer staples.  In this way, she will be able to offer her customers better quality and service, which will increase her sales and the income she receives from the business.

Miris states that her main desire is to continue to grow her business with the help of Interactuar.

By supporting this loan, you will be contributing to the entrepreneurial growth of Colombian women!

loans.use: to stock her grocery store with products

loans.name: Qimat

texts.ru:
Кимат начинающая предпринимательница. Не смотря на свой возраст (ей 48 лет), считает, что ни что не поздно начать. Она живет вместе с мужем и его женой живет на районе Шахритус. Кимат работает в маленьком прилавке, где печет и продает пирожки.
  Кимат хочет заниматься иным делом и она решила, что будет. Кимат хочет начать животноводческую деятельность. Для начала она планирует купить 3 голов маленьких, откормит, опоить, вырастить потом продать их. За счет выгоды она намерена купить еще больше телят и повторить этот процесс. Кимат верит, что она самостоятельно сможет начать и продолжить этот бизнес, если поддержат в ее начинаниях.
texts.en:
Qimat is starting out as entrepreneur. In spite of being 48 years old, she thinks it is never too late to start something new. She lives [with her husband] in the Shahrituz region. Qimat has a small sales stand, where she bakes small pies for sale.

Qimat decided to go into a different business and start raising livestock. At the beginning, she would like to buy three young calves, fatten them and later resell. She will use her revenues to buy additional calves and repeat the cycle. Qimat is confident that she will be able to launch and develop this business on her own if she receives support to get started.

loans.use: to buy three calves and launching a cattle business.

loans.name: Yoeun

texts.en:
A resident of Kampong Speu province, Cambodia, Yoeun is a 59-year-old widowed mother of two children who work in a factory. A rice farmer for over 34 years, Yoeun and her children can make approximately $11 per day. 

Because her house is old, Yoeun is requesting this loan to buy lumber and pillars to renovate it. This will enable her to enjoy better living conditions. In the future, she wants to buy more soil to fill the yard around her house.

loans.use: to buy lumber and pillars to renovate her house

loans.name: Gulinora

texts.ru: Гулинора 53 летняя жительница района Чиликул. Она замужем и мать двоих детей. У нее один сын и одна дочка. Сын и дочка студент. Они учатся в университете района. Мужу 54 года. Муж в районе занимается земледелием. Сама Гулинора работает преподавателем в средней школе и параллельно занимается земледелием. Она продвигает обеих деятельность уже 20 лет. Гулинора каждый сезон делает парник. В этом году она планирует расширить деятельность. Для расширения ей нужно материалы для парника. У нее нет средств для приобретения материалов, по этой причине она обратилась за кредитом. На оставшуюся часть денег она купить семян огурцов и дыни.  Гулинора с большой надеждой обратилась к вам за помощью.
texts.en: Gulinora is a 53-year-old resident of the Jilikul district. She is married and a mother of two children. She has one son and one daughter, both of whom are students at a university in the district. Her husband is 54 years old. He is involved in farming. Gulinora works as a teacher at a secondary school and is concurrently involved in farming. She has been doing this work and running the business for 20 years. Gulinora makes a greenhouse every season. She is planning to expand her business this year and needs materials for the greenhouse. Because she does not have money to buy the materials, she requested a loan. She will use the remainder of the loan to buy cucumber and cantaloupe seeds. Gulinora requested a loan from you with high hopes.

loans.use: to buy materials to build a greenhouse and also to buy cucumber and cantaloupe seeds

loans.name: Rafoathon

texts.ru: Рафоатхон молодая жительница района Чиликул. Ей 25 лет. Она не замужем и не имеет детей. Его брат женат и имеет детей. Он работает таксистом на районе. Рафоатхон на районе занимается садоводством и животноводством. Основная работа является животноводство. Она хорошо справляется с обеими деятельностями. Рафоатхон занимается этими деятельностями уже более 10 лет.  Она активная и ответственная девушка. Ей в работе помогает брат. Рафоатхон покупает скота и откармливает 30-40 дней и перепродает на скотном рынке. В настоящий момент Рафоатхон просит кредит, чтобы купить скота и увеличить поголовье скота и за счет этого увеличить доход от животноводческой деятельности.
texts.en: Rafoathon is a young resident of the Jilikul district. She is 25 years old, not married and does not have children. Her brother is married and has children. He works as a taxi driver. Rafoathon is involved in gardening and animal husbandry in her district. Animal husbandry is her primary work. She handles both businesses well. Rafoathon has been involved in this work for over 10 years. She is an active and responsible young woman. Her brother helps her with the work. Rafoathon buys livestock and fattens it up for 30-40 days and then resells it at a livestock market. Rafoathon is currently requesting this loan to buy livestock in order to increase her livestock headcount and increase her income from the animal husbandry business.

loans.use: to buy livestock in order to increase her livestock headcount and increase her income

loans.name: Toshbibi

texts.ru: Это женщина Тошбиби. Она жительница района Чиликул. Ей 52 лет. Она разведена с мужем. У нее двое сыновей. Сыновьям 30 и 17 лет. Старший сын женат и он занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельности. Тошбиби в районе занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельности. Она выращивает пшеницу и огурцы. Этим видом деятельности она занята 15 лет. Тошбиби нужно купить семян огурцы, пшеницу и минеральные удобрение для земли. Все жители района почти закончили посев, но Тошбиби пока еще не начала сев. Потому, что у нее нет денег на покупку семян огурцов и пшеницы. По этой причине она обратилась за кредитом. Это кредит поможет ей приобрести все, что ей нужно для посева и завершить его.
texts.en: This woman's name is Toshbibi. She is a resident of the Jilikul district. She is 52 years old, divorced from her husband and has two sons, who are 30 and 17 years old. The oldest son is married and involved in agriculture. Toshbibi is also involved in agriculture in her district. She grows wheat and cucumbers. She has been involved in this business for 15 years. Toshbibi needs to purchase cucumber and wheat seeds and mineral fertilizers for the soil. All of the district residents have almost completed their crop sowing, but Toshbibi has not yet started hers because she does not have money to buy cucumber and wheat seeds. This is why she requested this loan. The loan will help her to purchase everything needed to start and finish the sowing.

loans.use: to purchase cucumber and wheat seeds and mineral fertilizers for the soil

loans.name: Satya Laksana Group

texts.en:
After succeeding with the fattening pig program, Ni Komang decide to continue her business. She earned a satisfactory profit, which she set aside for savings and for business capital. But for now she still needs an additional loan to increase her pig population.

Ni Komang, 42, is a housewife and her husband works as a builder. She has two adult children, but they are not married yet. They live and work in the city. 

Ni Komang has sold her pigs, and now she will use her loan to purchase two more superior piglets. She will use her own money to buy feed and renovate the cages. 

Ni Komang and the Satya Laksana group agree to maintain piglets for fattening only. Now the price for two-month-old piglets is 600.000 IDR. She and all members of the Satya Laksana Group hope for the best results, and their main goal is to be independent in business capital. 

One member couldn't attend the meeting because she had to accompany her children to the hospital.

loans.use: to purchase two more superior piglets

loans.name: Demetiro

texts.en:
Demetrio is 75 years old and lives in Poblacion, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental. He is married with 5 children now at their adult age. 

Demetrio is engaged in rice palay trading and a rice production business for almost 50 years already.  ("palay" is rice before husking)

He is also a pensioner as a benefit of his contribution being an employed person. He is earning an average income of not less than Php5,000 a month from those activities, and this amount is very helpful in meeting their needs.  

He has requested a loan to be used in paying labor costs and other farm expenses of his ongoing rice production activity. Demetrio has been a member of PMPC for 9 years.  

In the future, Demetrio hopes to expand his rice palay trading business.

loans.use: to pay labor costs and other farm expenses.

loans.name: Charita

texts.en:
Charita is 32 years old and lives in Macabayao, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 1 child now at school age. 

Charita earns her living from an agricultural business, particularly a rice production activity. She’s been engaged in this business for 3 years already. 

She earns approximately PHP4,000 each month doing this type of business activity in which the said amount is helpful to meet their needs. 

She has requested a loan to be used to pay for commercial fertilizers and sprays as well as labor costs for her ongoing rice production activity. 

Charita became a member of PMPC just this year. In the future, Charita hopes to engage in another type of business.

loans.use: to pay for commercial fertilizers and sprays as well as labor costs

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 59 years old and married with two children. With one child in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Teresa runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her general store like canned goods, home care products and other groceries.

Teresa has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap, curls and other groceries. 

In the future, Teresa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her general store like canned goods, home care products and other groceries

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma is 34 years old and a married woman. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Thelma has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 16,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more items like soap, canned goods, shampoo and other groceries.

Thelma has been in this business for six years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like soap, canned goods, shampoo and other groceries.

loans.name: Julita

texts.en:
Julita is 58 years old and married with nine children, one of whom is in school. She earns a living by farming rice and sugarcane in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Julita has been farming rice and sugarcane for four years. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is married and 24 years old. She is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to purchase sacks of fertilizers and other farm equipment and supplies.

Cristina has been for five years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of ferlilizers and other farm equipment and supplies.

loans.name: Maria Fe

texts.en:
Maria Fe is a widowed woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Maria Fe is 48 years old now.

Maria Fe has a processed food business in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more processed food to sell in her stall.

Maria Fe has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more processed food to sell in her stall

loans.name: Mirzhan

texts.ru: Миржан, 31 год, женат, детей пока нет. У Миржана среднее образование, он занимается сельским хозяйством уже 5 лет. У него есть 4 коровы, 2 лошади. На ежедневной основе продает молоко. Совокупная прибыль Миржана составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, он обратился в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров с целью разведения и увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Миржан будет использовать для развития своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Mirzhan is 31 years old, married, and has no children so far. Mirzhan has received secondary education. He has been doing farm work for five years. He owns four cows and two horses. He sells milk on a daily basis. His total revenue is about 15,000 KGS. In order to develop his business further, Mizhan has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance association for a loan in the amount of 40,000 KGS to buy cows in order to raise cattle and increase his headcount. Mirzhan plans to use the his revenues to develop his farm further.

loans.use: to buy some cows in order to increase his livestock headcount

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
From Pagadian City, Evelyn earns a living through her sales of used clothing. She manages to have enough inventory to continuously provide for her family. 

For her capital needs, PMPC has stood by her since the start of her business. She is happy that she is able to survive the odds of business with determination and her family as her inspiration. 

To earn more, she applied for a loan to purchase more used clothing inventory to sell. Evelyn hopes to live comfortably and that her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing inventory to sell.

location.town: PAgadian - Dao, Pagadian City Zamboanga del sur

loans.name: Adelfa

texts.en:
Adelfa is from Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She is 34 years old and is married. Her husband is a farmer and has cultivated a small area of rice land near their home. 

To generate more income, Adelfa engages in rice retailing and "palay" trading business. She applied for her membership in PMPC after she learned that she can get financial assistance from them. 

When Adelfa has saved an amount of money from her business, she wants to cultivate another piece of rice land to expand her resources. 

Consequently, she requested a loan to pay for the acquisition of a piece of rice land from her parents. Adelfa smiles at the thought of having a comfortable life and providing her family, and even her parents, a better life.

loans.use: to pay for the acquisition of a piece of rice land from her parents.

loans.name: Madelin

texts.en:
Madelin engages in vegetable farming. She toils the land and grows vegetables.  Aside from that, she also engages in fishing. She catches and sells fish.  She is a 39-year-old, married woman with four children, ages 16 to 2 years old respectively. She has been engaged in that kind of business for two years now.

She is asking for a loan to buy fishing materials like nylon, nails, and tie wire. These will improve her ongoing catch, and augment her daily income. In this way, she will be able to handle her finances and provide for the needs of her growing children.  In the future, she dreams to expand her business, to finance the schooling of her growing children.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials like nylon, nails, and tie wire.

loans.name: Conception

texts.en:
Conception has mastered her hog raising business in Mangidkid, Plaridel. This is how she makes a living and is able to support her family. 

She was at her lowest point when she didn't have enough capital for her business. When she joined PMPC, she was truly grateful to be able to take advantage of credit to fully support her business. 

Just as she takes care her hog raising business, so she manages her membership with PMPC. She wants to maintain her membership in good standing so she can always ask for any financing needs. 

Now, the loan of Php 14,000 will help her build concrete pig pens that will support sanitation and care for the environment.

loans.use: to build concrete pig pens.

loans.name: Genie
