Solicita préstamo para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento de su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Hector espera brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Hector is 40, in a relationship, and lives in his own home with his two children in the district of Oyotún, which is located in Chiclayo Province, Lambayeque Region, on Peru's northern coast.  The inhabitants of this district work in farming, commerce, and raising animals.  

He offers transportation services on his motorcycle with a trailer.  He has been doing this work for five years and he has good personal and professional references in the area.  He is requesting a loan to perform repairs and maintenance on his vehicle, as it is currently in bad shape.  With this, Hector hopes to offer his customers better service, which will allow him to make more income, which will improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to perform repairs and maintenance on his vehicle, as it is currently in bad shape

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 29 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. Rowena works very hard to provide for them.

Rowena runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

Rowena has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, noodles, and other groceries. 

In the future Rowena would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Shirly

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Shirly works hard to support her family.

She has a charcoal retailing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store.  Shirly is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to buy more stocks of charcoal to sell.

Shirly has been sustaining her business activities through her past 25 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Ninfa

texts.en:
Ninfa is 49 years old and married with four children. One of her children is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Ninfa has a general store business in the Philippines. Ninfa requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more items like canned goods, snack food, diapers, and other groceries.

Ninfa has been in this business for five years. In the future, Ninfa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like canned goods, snack food, diapers, and other groceries.

loans.name: Juvy

texts.en:
Juvy is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Juvy is 34 years old and has two children who attend school.

Juvy has run a a general store business in the Philippines for two years. Juvy requested a PHP 10000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more items like snack food, canned goods and other groceries.

In the future, Juvy would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items like snack food, canned goods and other groceries.

loans.name: Lorenca

texts.en:
Lorenca is  taking a loan of USD 1,000.00 to improve her business. She is married and she has five children and she is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. 

She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store such as  noodles, Fanta, soap, eggs, fish, biscuits, cigarettes, and candles. She opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of USD 600.00.  She is a hard working woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy noodles, Fanta, soap, eggs, fish, biscuits, cigarettes, and candles.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase construction materials to renovate her house.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 51 years old, married, and has seven children, one of whom is in school.

Nenita is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Nenita requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Nenita has been raising pigs for ten years now, and has borrowed nine times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Nenita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is 47 years old, married, and has eight children. Two of her children are in school.

Helen is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Helen requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds and medicines for her pigs.

Helen has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Helen would like to save money to expand her business and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy feeds and medicines for her pigs.
